title: Dragon’s Dogma II Microtransaction Mayhem! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.22.24
description:

Go to http://robinhood.com/boost to subscribe to Robinhood Gold and get a 3% match on every dollar you transfer in from another retirement account. Offer good through April 30th.

We’re here to talk about video game news!

SnowBikeMike is hosting the Grounded PAX East panel alongside Obsidian! This is going down at 2:30PM ET in the Albatross Theater, but you can also watch online at twitch.tv/PAX2
